data_table.description: Physical Ability Questionnaire, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PAQA1
variable.description: Walking for a quarter of a mile (that is about 2 or 3 blocks)? Q1 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA2
variable.description: Walking up 10 steps without resting? Q2 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA3
variable.description: Stooping, crouching, or kneeling? Q3 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA4
variable.description: Lifting or carrying something as heavy as 10 pounds? Q4 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA5
variable.description: Doing chores around the house (like vacuuming, sweeping, dusting, or straightening up)? Q5 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA6
variable.description: Preparing your own meals? Q6 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA7
variable.description: Managing your money (such as keeping track of your expenses or paying bills)? Q7 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA8
variable.description: Walking from one room to another on the same level? Q8 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA9
variable.description: Standing up from an armless straight chair? Q9 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA10
variable.description: Getting in or out of bed? Q10 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA11
variable.description: Eating, including holding a fork, cutting food, or drinking from a glass? Q11 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA12
variable.description: Dressing yourself, including tying shoes, working zippers, and doing buttons? Q12 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
variable.value: Don't know or do not do

variable.name: PAQA13
variable.description: Because of any impairment or health problem, do you need the help of other persons for personal care needs such as eating, bathing, dressing or getting around your home? Q13 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: PAQA14
variable.description: Because of any impairment or health problem, do you need the help of other persons in handling routine needs, such as everyday household chores, doing necessary business, shopping, or getting around for other purposes? Q14 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: PAQA15
variable.description: Do you usually use any device to help you get around such as a cane, wheelchair, crutches or walker? Q15 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: PAQA16
variable.description: Do you usually use any special eating utensils? Q16 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: PAQA17
variable.description: Do you usually use any aids or devices to help you dress (such as button hooks, zipper pulls, long-handled shoe horn, etc.)? Q17 [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: PAQAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Physical Ability Questionnaire] [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: PAQACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Physical Ability Questionnaire, exam 4]
